entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 3 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Snow. Rain along the coast late in the morning and early afternoon. Blowing snow inland in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 3 except minus 2 inland. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
